languages.text: "Вы многое пережили за последнее время... подобное может сказаться на душевном равновесии любого из нас". {n}Несмотря на расслабленный тон, Абеляр продолжает внимательно изучать вас взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы многое пережили за последнее время... подобное может сказаться на душевном равновесии любого из нас". {n}Несмотря на расслабленный тон, Абеляр продолжает внимательно изучать вас взглядом.{/n}

languages.text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы многое пережили за последнее время... подобное может сказаться на душевном равновесии любого из нас". {n}Несмотря на расслабленный тон, Абеляр продолжает внимательно изучать вас взглядом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}
"You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}
"You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}
"You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}

languages.text: “最近几天你确实承受了很多压力……无论是谁摆在你的位置上，都会手足无措。”{n}尽管阿贝拉德的语气很轻松，但他的双眼依然在打量着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “最近几天你确实承受了很多压力……无论是谁摆在你的位置上，都会手足无措。”{n}尽管阿贝拉德的语气很轻松，但他的双眼依然在打量着你。{/n}

languages.text: 「ここ数日、あなたは多くのことに耐えてきました…あなたのような立場にある人なら、誰でも平衡感覚を失うことでしょう」{n}落ち着いた口調とは裏腹に、アベラードは詮索するようにあなたを見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ここ数日、あなたは多くのことに耐えてきました…あなたのような立場にある人なら、誰でも平衡感覚を失うことでしょう」{n}落ち着いた口調とは裏腹に、アベラードは詮索するようにあなたを見る。{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr habt in den letzten Tagen viel durchgemacht ... jeder in Eurer Lage würde sein Gleichgewicht verlieren." {n}Trotz seines entspannten Tonfalls mustert Abelard dich weiterhin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt in den letzten Tagen viel durchgemacht ... jeder in Eurer Lage würde sein Gleichgewicht verlieren." {n}Trotz seines entspannten Tonfalls mustert Abelard dich weiterhin.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez enduré bien des épreuves ces derniers jours... n'importe qui dans votre position serait déstabilisé. » {n}Malgré son ton détendu en apparence, Abélard vous observe avec attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez enduré bien des épreuves ces derniers jours... n'importe qui dans votre position serait déstabilisé. » {n}Malgré son ton détendu en apparence, Abélard vous observe avec attention.{/n}

languages.text: «Ha soportado muchas cosas en estos días... cualquiera en su posición se encontraría al límite de sus fuerzas». {n}A pesar de la relajación de su tono, Abelard sigue examinándote.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ha soportado muchas cosas en estos días... cualquiera en su posición se encontraría al límite de sus fuerzas». {n}A pesar de la relajación de su tono, Abelard sigue examinándote.{/n}

languages.text: "Son günlerde çok şey yaşadınız, badireler atlattınız... Yerinizde kim olsa itidalini kaybederdi." {n}Abelard, rahatlamış ses tonuna rağmen seni süzmeye devam ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You have endured much in recent days... anyone in your position would lose their equilibrium." {n}Despite his relaxed tone, Abelard continues to scrutinise you.{/n}
